channel.title: Save On The Ray-Ban RX8582
channel.description: Ray-Ban was launched in 1937. Originally designed for Lt. John McCready of the US Air Force; he wanted a pair of glasses that would protect his eyes as well as look good. Soon other members of the US Air Force followed suit and wore the glasses to protect their eyes whilst flying. Ray-Ban are now [...]
